where did you spend the night?

translation.quote: urar, tekki deg usaru (lfilm), taceqquft umezgun

examples.example: how long will you stay in Canada?
examples.transExample: acḥal ar ad teqqimeḍ di Kanada?

form.usage:
"To steal" neγ "to rob": Amyag "rob" yettamaga ma yella yiwen yuker bnadem nniḍen, neγ yuker amkan (am lbanka). Amedya: "he robbed a bank" => "yuker lbanka".
Dagi, ur neqqar ara "he stole the bank" (acuγer? acku anamek-is am akken yeddem lbanka-nni s timad-is akken d takemmalit yewwi-tt yid-s umakur). Amyag "to steal" yettmaga ma yiwen yuker taγawsa, yeddem kra yid-s. Amedya: "he stole the money" => "yuker idrimen".
Dagi amakur yeddem kra yid-s: idrimen, ddheb... Ur neqqar ara "he robbed the money"

examples.example: I stepped on some broken glass

examples.transExample: mazal ur fukkeγ ara / werԑad kfiγ

examples.example: I found a strange man in my house
examples.transExample: ufiγ argaz d aberrani deg uxxam-iw

examples.transExample: ḥemleγ imyura am Kafka d Camus

translation.quote: d amqim: udem wis sin amalay d wunti (asuf, asget)
amqim udmawan ilelli: kečč, kemm, kunwi, kunemti

examples.transExample: kečč d nekk / kemm d nekk

translation.quote: amqim awsil n umyag (asemmad usrid deffir umyag): -k , -ik, -kem, -ikem, -ken, -iken, -kent, -ikent
amqim awsil n umyag (asemmad arusrid, deffir umyag): -ak , -yak, -am, -yam, -awen, -yawen, -awent, -yawent

examples.transExample: ad dduγ yid-k / ad dduγ yid-m / ad dduγ yid-wen / ad dduγ yid-went

translation.quote: -k, -ik (awsil n yisem n wudem wis 2 n wasuf amalay)
-m, -im (awsil n yisem n wudem wis 2 n wasuf unti)
-nwen, (awsil n yisem n wudem wis 2 n wesget amalay)
-nwent, (awsil n yisem n wudem wis 2 n wesget unti)
